data.message: People are bitching bc he dissed Dump? Have they forgotten all his other songs. Mosh where he disses bush and his whole admin. Kim where he talks about murdering his wife. I'm Back where he  talks about pregnating Jennifer Lopez. The list goes on and on. How are you shocked?  This is shady this is what he does and who he is.  "Slim Shady does not give a fuck what you think. If you don't like it you can suck his fucking cock."
